Package domain.block

Class ConditionBlock

java.lang.Object
domain.block.Block
domain.block.ConditionBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChainConditionBlock, SingleConditionBlock
public abstract class ConditionBlock
extends Block
An abstract class of ConditionBlocks that extends Block and has a previous block.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

    • getBlockAbove

      protected Block getBlockAbove()
      Description copied from class: Block
      Return the block that is connected before this block. This can be on the left side or above the current one.
      Specified by:
      getBlockAbove in class Block
      Returns:
      The block that is connected before this block (on the left side for conditionBlocks or on the upper side of sequenceBlocks).

    • getLastBlock

      protected ConditionBlock getLastBlock()
      Description copied from class: Block
      Return the last block of the connection chain to this block.
      Specified by:
      getLastBlock in class Block
      Returns:
      The last block of the connection chain to this block. (Most right block for conditionBlocks and lowest block for sequenceBlocks)
